Other common names: Longcomb Sawfish, Longsnout Sawfish, Narrowsnout Sawfish, Olive sawfish
Fish-eating Crocodile, Gavial, Indian gavial, Indian gharial, Long-nosed Crocodile
Geographic Distribution: Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Myanmar, Nepal, Pakistan
Cambodia, China, Hong Kong, Lao, Myanmar, Thailand, Vietnam

Other common names: African Sharp-nosed Crocodile, African Slender-snouted Crocodile, Long-snouted Crocodile
